price: Ní ti àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n sì ṣe iṣẹ́ rere, àwọn ibùgbé (nínú) Ọ̀gbà Ìdẹ̀ra ń bẹ fún wọn. (Ó jẹ́) ohun tí A pèsè sílẹ̀ (dè wọ́n) nítorí ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́ (rere).
arabic: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُلَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum jannātu al-mawā nuzulan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
